Introduction

LuciDreaM (루시드림) is a South Korean live idol group, formed in 2022 as a duo with members Ria and PPOYO.

On September 23rd 2024 members Luna and Yuna were introduced to the group, followed by the release of their 1st full-length album PERSONA on September 24st 2024.
